title: Workflow DSL Schema
description: Defines the structure for a workflow automation sequence.

steps.description: An array of actions to perform in sequence.

action.description: The type of action to perform (e.g., 'click', 'type', 'navigate').

selector.description: A CSS selector to target an element for the action.

value.description: A value to use with the action (e.g., text to type, URL to navigate to).

loop.description: Defines how this step should be looped.

times.description: Number of times to repeat the step.

items.description: An array of items to iterate over, substituting {{item}} in the step.

condition.description: Defines a condition under which this step should execute.

ifExists.description: Execute step only if an element matching this selector exists.

ifValue.description: Execute step only if the element's value matches.

jsHatch.description: An escape hatch to execute arbitrary JavaScript code.
